title: Deleon Tequila fonts (small serif and script headings)
content:
Two images attached for reference. The script is Bickham-esque but curlier. The serif is very small but still reads nicely. any ideas what these are?

images attached as well.

here is the site:  
 [http://deleontequila.com/deleontequila.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023130145/http:/deleontequila.com/deleontequila.html "http://deleontequila.com/deleontequila.html")

thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023130145im_/http:/typophile.com/files/serifSmall_5972.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023130145im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scriptHeader_4568.gif)
author: efthomas

comments.content:
The script seems to be [Snell Roundhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023130145/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/snell-roundhand/).

I think the slab caps are Kontrapunkt, a free font.
awesome. both are spot on. thanks!

“The Family” is [Kontrapunkt](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023130145/http:/www.kontrapunktdesign.com/news/ddprize_typeface_of_the_year_2004). Note the free download links.

Edit: I really need to slow down today... completely missed Jan’s ID.

Hmmm, that is where I got them a few years ago.

Here is a link for [Kontrapunkt](http://web.archive.org/web/20091023130145/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Kontrapunkt) on Font Squirrel.

It works great. Thank you.  
Andreas
